actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act for the purpose of imposing labeling requirements on meat products containing mechanically de-boned meat.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Meat Inspection Act to require all meat products containing mechanically deboned meat to carry a label indicating that such product contains mechanically deboned meat and the amounts of fat, protein, and calcium contained in such meat food product.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Meat Inspection Act for the purpose of imposing labeling requirements on meat products containing mechanically de-boned meat.
